====== JCacheStorageEaccelerator ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCacheStorageEaccelerator #}

eAccelerator cache storage handler
===== Methods =====
^ Method ^ Description ^
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-__construct|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-__construct|__construct]] | Constructor |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-clean|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-clean|clean]] | Clean cache for a group given a mode.<p>group mode		: cleans all cache in the group  notgroup mode	: cleans all cache not in the group</p> |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-gc|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-gc|gc]] | Garbage collect expired cache data |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-get|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-get|get]] | Get cached data from eAccelerator by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-remove|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-remove|remove]] | Remove a cached data entry by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-store|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-store|store]] | Store the data to eAccelerator by id and group |
| [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-test|{{http://dev.joomla.org/media/images/Method.png }}]] [[JCacheStorageEaccelerator-test|test]] | Test to see if the cache storage is available. |

----

~~DISCUSSION~~
